message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to start with an offer of $12,000. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it, but I'm looking to spend a bit less. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. What do you think?
I understand you're looking to spend a bit less, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $11,000. What do you think?
